title: [Self-Directed] Workshop on Designing Augmented Reality-Based Spatial Reasoning Education for Early Childhood

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic mathematics education and potential for digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Strengthening AR-based educational content design capabilities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: One can explain a three-stage or more process for designing spatial reasoning activities using AR technology.
For early childhood learners, one can propose at least two types of AR experiential learning scenarios tailored to learner environmental characteristics.
One can develop at least one spatial reasoning educational tool implementable within limited technological resources (smartphones).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
